title: Which judge on The Voice is the most successful? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hard to say, but these are the most famous ones in my opinion in no particular order: . Jessie J .will.i.am was popular some years ago, but he’s under the radar now. .Rita Ora .Meghan Trainor .Olly Murs .Tom was popular back in the day, but not now.
